description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with removal of a shared chimney stack and installation of 2no front roof lights to facilitate loft conversion. Alterations to fenestration.
decision_conditions: The erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with removal of a shared chimney stack and installation of 2no front roof lights to facilitate loft conversion and alterations to fenestration fall within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes A, B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

There is a requirement to make alterations to vehicular access(s). Applicants should note the provisions of section 184 of the Highways Act 1980. The works should be carried out to the satisfaction of the Council and you will be required to pay fees to cover the Councils costs in undertaking the approval and inspection of the works.

Please provide a copy of proposed block plan drawn at an identified standard metric scale (such as 1:200 or 1:500) showing the proposed works (hatched or shaded) in relation to the existing dwelling, site boundaries and any outbuildings on site.  The block plan must show the direction of North and should also show adjoining properties to the side and rear and those opposite in full outline.The submitted block plan does not show the proposed development in hatched or shaded.
